review: My grand mother had chest pain so went to hospital. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. I have plans to go for follow-up soon based on situation. There was less waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor was very friendly.

My husband had been to hospital and it was for general heart checkup* ********* *** **** ** ******* I would like to recommend the doctor to other people.  Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. There was less  waiting time in the hospital . It was 10-15 minutes. I am satisfied with the  treatment given by the doctor. Diet was suggested.

My father had been to hospital and it was for high BP. ********* *** **** ** ******. I am satisfied with the explanation given by the doctor. I am unable to visit now. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Scanning and blood test was done. There was some waiting time in the hospital when we went. Exercise was suggested and he told to cut salt intake. In July I have plans to visit again.
The doctor is really patient, friendly and compassionate. He understands and listens to each and every detail and advises accordingly. Really happy experience. God bless him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm very much satisfied with doctor's treatment...I'm suffering with panic attacks since 2 years...I went to other cardiologist hospitals also..but no one suggested this test...sir suggested holter test to make sure of whether heart disease is there or not...

my mom has undergone bypass surgery 14 years back and the surgery was done by Rayudu garu, till date my mom did not get even a single issue and we are very very happy with the treatment and also the way doctor respects the patients and take care of them he is very much trusted doctor in the city.
